name: Work-A-Holic
description:
Welcome to NAF Inc. indie company, NAFCoke.

We appreciate that you have decided to join our team as General Factor 0.

Our task consists of precise and focus attention to filling up energy for the latest product, Static Juice. All you have to do is fill up the bottle with the good stuff and allow others to do the rest. If you make a few mistakes no biggie, but if you make too many mistakes, you will face consequences. Our Boss will monitor every move you make, so no pressure.

Along with the upcoming project from our friends in Unity-Real Engine, the Virtual Internet Router or the VIR, we decided to promote their ad on our drinks. Check more on their twitter.
